titles.title: In the Secret Place of the Most High

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
In the secret place of the Most High
In the land where we never shall die
Where the arrow by day
Shall not hinder thy way
In the secret place of the Most High.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ten thousand shall fall by thy right hand
And a thousand shall fall at thy side
It shall not come nigh unto thee, My Son
In the secret place of the Most High.
